data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bland, Keith P. (2019): Name-bearing types of butterflies (Lepidoptera, Papilionoidea), in the National Museums of Scotland, Edinburgh. Zootaxa 4559 (1): 57-89, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4559.1.2|59 occurrences
